review_blob: Draft serving. Did smell like bananas and cloves but the taste has much to be desired. The flavor was overpowered by astringent taste that some on else noted. After taste hung around in my mouth for awhile. Will not be drinking this one again.
Great amount of hops. I really like this beer. One of my favorite IPAs. I cannot wait to have some more.
Really liked this beer. It was a good amount of hops and I really like hoppy beers. I am glad it was suggested to me.
beer_name: Lagunitas A Little Sumpin Sumpin Ale

review_blob: I really look forward to this beer every year when it comes out in late March. It brings back lots of memories of living in Kalamazoo and drinking a glass with friends. I would recommend this beer to anyone looking for a great summertime ale.
